name: Acora
tagline: Leading IT Support, Services & Technology Company
description:
We are a UK based, award-winning IT services and technology partner with over 25 years’ experience. We deliver innovative managed, applications, consultancy and cloud solutions to dynamic mid-market companies who want to modernise their IT to compete and win in the digital economy.
More than 200 clients trust us to take responsibility for part, or all, of their business IT from the design and build of complex solutions to the day to day management of services. They rely on us to understand their IT requirements so they can focus on their business goals.
We work with, for and alongside our clients from the boardroom, to the data centre, to the desktop. Our advise, transform and manage approach ensures we understand our clients’ business objectives and journey first, so the services we provide are right for them.
